import React from 'react' import './Modal.css' import { Rating } from '../Book-slider/Rating' export const Modal = ({ setOpenModel, bookdata }) => { return (
setOpenModel(false)} className="bi bi-x-circle-fill close-icon">

{bookdata.title}

Auther : {bookdata.author}

price : $ {bookdata.price}

Please select a 5 digit number from 0 to 9.

) }
